publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1372 Angus MacKay: Salmon Conservation (Scotland) Bill - Financial Resolutionâ€”That the Parliament, for the purposes of any Act of the Scottish Parliament resulting from the Salmon Conservation (Scotland) Bill, agrees to any increase attributable to that Act in the sums payable out of the Scottish Consolidated Fund by or under any other Act.
S1M-1372 Salmon Conservation (Scotland) Bill - Financial Resolution (lodged on 20 November 2000) Ross Finnie*, Rhona Brankin*
